Interface DelegateNodeRepository

    • Method Detail

      • findAll

        @Query(value="SELECT d FROM DelegateNode d WHERE (:criteria IS NULL                                                                  OR (UPPER(d.receiver) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT(\'%\',:criteria),\'%\'))           OR UPPER(d.name) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT(\'%\',:criteria),\'%\')))) AND EXISTS (SELECT id FROM DelegateNode dz WHERE (d.name LIKE CONCAT(name, \':%\') OR d.name  = name)  AND ((receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.USER    AND receiver=:user)  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.GROUP   AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheGroup cg   WHERE receiver = cg.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheMembership cm INNER JOIN cm.group g WHERE cm.user.id = :user          AND (g.description = cg.description OR g.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cg.description)))))  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.COMPANY AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheCompany cc WHERE receiver = cc.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheUser cu INNER JOIN cu.company c   WHERE cu.id = :user          AND (c.description = cc.description OR c.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cc.description)))))))")
org.springframework.data.domain.Page<DelegateNode> findAll(java.lang.String user,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String criteria,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable page)
        Return all DelegateNode objects regarding the given criteria.
        Parameters:
        user - The user requesting the objects.
        criteria - Optional, use to match by LDAP object name or target user.
        page - the pagination.
        Returns:
        all DelegateNode objects with the given name. Insensitive case search is used.

      • manageNode

        @Query(value="SELECT COUNT(id) FROM DelegateNode WHERE canAdmin = true AND (canWrite = true OR :write = false) AND (:node LIKE CONCAT(name, \':%\') OR name  = :node) AND ((receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.USER    AND receiver=:user)  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.GROUP   AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheGroup cg   WHERE receiver = cg.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheMembership cm INNER JOIN cm.group g WHERE cm.user.id = :user          AND (g.description = cg.description OR g.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cg.description)))))  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.COMPANY AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheCompany cc WHERE receiver = cc.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheUser cu INNER JOIN cu.company c   WHERE cu.id = :user          AND (c.description = cc.description OR c.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cc.description))))))")
int manageNode(java.lang.String user,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String node,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           boolean write)
        Return a positive number if the given node can be updated or created by the given user. A node can be managed when it is visible and it exists at least one delegation with administration right for this node or one its parent.
        Parameters:
        user - The user name requesting to manage a node.
        node - The related node to manage.
        write - The write flag of the new delegate.
        Returns:
        A positive number if the given node can be managed by the given user.

      • delete

        @Query(value="DELETE DelegateNode d WHERE d.id = :id AND EXISTS (SELECT id FROM DelegateNode dz WHERE (d.name LIKE CONCAT(name, \':%\') OR d.name  = name)  AND ((receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.USER    AND receiver=:user)  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.GROUP   AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheGroup cg   WHERE receiver = cg.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheMembership cm INNER JOIN cm.group g WHERE cm.user.id = :user          AND (g.description = cg.description OR g.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cg.description)))))  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.COMPANY AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheCompany cc WHERE receiver = cc.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheUser cu INNER JOIN cu.company c   WHERE cu.id = :user          AND (c.description = cc.description OR c.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cc.description)))))) AND dz.canAdmin = true)")
 @Modifying
int delete(int id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String user)
        Return a positive amount if the given entity has been deleted by the given user. A delegate can be deleted when it is visible and it exists at least one delegation with administration right for this node or one its parent.
        Parameters:
        id - The identifier of object to delete.
        user - The user name requesting to manage a node.
        Returns:
        A positive number if the given delegate has been deleted.
